thread.title: Hamas: going to Cairo with 'positive spirit' to reach agreement | Law-Order
thread.title_full: Hamas: going to Cairo with 'positive spirit' to reach agreement | Law-Order

author: Reuters
title: Hamas: going to Cairo with 'positive spirit' to reach agreement | Law-Order
text: Hamas: going to Cairo with 'positive spirit' to reach agreement [Reuters](/reuters-stories)| Cairo | Updated: 04-05-2024 01:37 IST | Created: 04-05-2024 01:37 IST - Country: - Egypt Hamas emphasized its positive spirit with which the movement had studied the ceasefire proposal received recently and will go to Cairo with the same spirit to reach an agreement, the Palestinian militant group said on Friday. "We are determined to secure an agreement in a way that fulfils Palestinians' demands," Hamas said in a statement. (This story has not been edited by Devdiscourse staff and is auto-generated from a syndicated feed.) - READ MORE ON: - [Hamas](/news?tag=Hamas) - [ceasefire](/news?tag=ceasefire) - [Cairo](/news?tag=Cairo) - [agreement](/news?tag=agreement) - [Palestinian](/news?tag=Palestinian) - [militant](/news?tag=militant) - [demands](/news?tag=demands) - [negotiation](/news?tag=negotiation) - [conflict](/news?tag=conflict) - [peace](/news?tag=peace) Advertisement ALSO READ [US vetoes UN Security Council resolution on Palestinian statehood](/article/international/2901649-us-vetoes-un-security-council-resolution-on-palestinian-statehood) [US to vote 'no' on Palestinian statehood resolution at UN](/article/international/2901634-us-to-vote-no-on-palestinian-statehood-resolution-at-un) [Pakistan police kill bomber, militant to thwart attack on Japanese nationals](/article/law-order/2901730-pakistan-police-kill-bomber-militant-to-thwart-attack-on-japanese-nationals) [UN experts alarmed over systemic destruction of Palestinian education system](/article/law-order/2901764-un-experts-alarmed-over-systemic-destruction-of-palestinian-education-system) [KZN Premier launches Programme to assist small-scale farmers to meet demands](/article/headlines/2902185-kzn-premier-launches-programme-to-assist-small-scale-farmers-to-meet-demands)
